cmp: 只 (earth-spirit/peace, (a measure word, for birds and some animals, etc.)/single/only, M for one of a pair, only/merely/just/but, but/only)

exm.mng: to organize, organization, organized system, nerve, tissue
to weave, to manufacture by weaving
Vega (star), Weaving girl of folk tales
to weave, to knit, to plait, to braid, (fig.) to create (sth abstract, e.g. a dream, a lie etc)
